name: Sphaera
description: Sphaera is a game about relaxation and exploration in a huge grass field filled with animals.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
